litw-template-title: Teleportation? The future of mixed reality?
litw-irb-header: Read the Tarot Cards of Tech: predict the future of mixed reality!
litw-irb-subheader-1: Please read the following information carefully before proceeding.
litw-irb-body-1-p1: Why we are doing this research?
litw-irb-body-1-p2: The primary goal of this project is to improve access totechnology for diverse people.
litw-irb-body-2-p1: What you will have to do?
litw-irb-body-2-p2: First, you will answer three multiple-choice questions regardingyour prior opinions of new technology. Second, you will watch a video about mixed reality. Third,you  will  interact   with  three  Tarot   Cards   of   Tech  that  help   you  brainstorm   unintendedconsequences of mixed reality. Finally, you will predict when mixed reality will become availablein the future based on the video and the Tarot Cards.
litw-irb-body-3-p1: What you will get out of it?
litw-irb-body-3-p2: We will give you feedback on how you performed on the tasks.The final results from this experiment will be posted on our blog page. The studies on thiswebsite are not for clinical diagnoses.
litw-irb-body-4-p2: Your responses will be kept anonymous. We do not store anyinformation that could be used to directly establish your identity. We may, however, collectbrowser data, the city and country you are located in, mouse and click data, social mediasharing activity, scrolling behavior, scores earned, timestamp, time spent on each page, or otherdata that may be derived from your behavior on our page. This data will be stored securely onour servers.
litw-irb-body-6-p2: If you have questions about this research, you may contact Professor Katharina Reinecke, Paul G. Allen Center for Computer Science & Engineering, Box 352350, Seattle, WA 98195, reinecke@cs.washington.edu
litw-irb-body-7-p2: This research is supported by the National Science Foundation.
litw-irb-body-final: If you have questions about your rights as a research participant, or wish to obtain information, ask questions or discuss any concerns about this study with someone other than the researcher(s), please contact the University of Washington Human Subjects Division at 206-543-0098 or call collect at 206-221-5940 (for international calls include the US Calling Code: +1-206-543-0098.)
litw-irb-consent: By ticking this box, you are agreeing to be in the study. Be sure that questions you have about the study have been answered and that you understand what you are being asked to do. You may contact the researcher if you think of a question later. You are free to leave the experiment at any time, and refusing to be in the experiment or stopping participation will involve no penalty or loss of benefits to which you are otherwise entitled.
litw-irb-warning: You must check the box to continue.
cards-prompt: To begin, press the arrow button. You will be dealt a random card from the deck.
litw-motivationsurvey-header: Would you mind answering these quick questions?
litw-motivationsurvey-question1: 1. Whatâ€™s your experience with mixed reality (XR) technologies before?
litw-motivationsurvey-question2: 2. Would you consider yourself as someone who always uses the newest technology?
litw-motivationsurvey-question3: 3. Do you think that technology has caused more harm than good?
litw-motivationsurvey-question4: 5. What is your attitude towards the harms of technological advances?
litw-motivationsurvey-question1-1: Some examples of XR technologies include Oculus Rift, Google Glasses, HoloLens, Samsung Gear.
litw-motivationsurvey-answer1-2: Have heard of it but have not used it
litw-motivationsurvey-answer1-3: Have heard of it and tried it once or twice
litw-motivationsurvey-answer1-4: Have heard of it and use it occasionally
litw-motivationsurvey-answer1-5: Have heard of it and use it often
litw-motivation-warning: Please answer the questions above to continue
litw-video-header: Let's take a look at the future of mixed reality
litw-video-p1: The use of mixed reality (XR) technologies is at its infancy. Big technology companies are battling to lead the future of more affordable and pervasive devices and software. Technologists envision a world immersed with these tools.
instruction-header: You are reading the Tarot Cards of Mixed Reality (XR) Tech
card-header: Click on the Tarot Card of Tech to reveal the future of mixed reality and answer the questions in the text box below.
litw-card1-question1: To what extent do you think XR technology will enhance/detract your relationships with your friends and family in 10 years?
litw-card2-question1: How likely do you think you will use XR technology in 10 years?
litw-futuresurvey-header: Would you mind answering these quick questions?
litw-futuresurvey-question1: 1. In how many years do you think of the mixed reality technology could be available for your home country?
litw-futuresurvey-question2: 2. Do you think that future mixed reality technology will cause more harm than good?
litw-future-warning: Please answer the questions to see your results!
litw-results-p1: Thank you for completing the study.
litw-results-p2: Here's what experts have predicted about augmented, virtual, and mixed reality:
litw-results-q1-vis-label: You predicted that mixed reality will be adopted in your home country in
litw-results-q2-vis-label: Do you think that future mixed reality technology will cause more harm than good? Your rating is:
